how.title: My involvement
how.thoughts:
Adapting from the previous website and branding, we rebranded and built a new website. I designed and developed a bespoke, responsive template/theme - ensuring that all of the relevant content remains editable via the CMS.

I really enjoyed building the gallery and some flexible tabbed content to work smoothly on both desktops and mobiles:

We also integrated some lovely, full page background images:
